name: top-message-board
description: Set up a basic Express app by installing Express and EJS. Set up a basic index route and run your server. Create the required folders and files as discussed in the previous lessons. We are going to have 2 routes, the index ("/") and a “new message” form ("/new"). Create an array at the top of your index router called messages and put a couple of sample messages inside of it like this:
